function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 through respiratory droplets and infectious aerosols","Impact":"High transmission rates and rapid spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, social distancing, and proper ventilation in indoor spaces","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C air purifiers, and contactless technologies","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Health authorities, government, and building management"},{"Description":"Indirect transmission via contaminated surfaces (fomites)","Impact":"Increased risk of infection through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of frequently touched surfaces","Technologies":"Disinfectant sprays, UV-C disinfection systems, and antimicrobial coatings","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management, cleaning services, and facilities maintenance"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic individuals spreading the virus","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating potential carriers of the virus","Mitigation":"Regular testing, contact tracing, and promoting symptom awareness","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, digital contact tracing apps, and public health communication tools","People":"General population and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health authorities, testing facilities, and public health agencies"}]}
